alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 9:37PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MADISON...LOWNDES AND SOUTHEASTERN BROOKS COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM EDT... At 937 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Valdosta, moving southwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Valdosta, Quitman, Hahira, Moody Air Force Base, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, Morven, Barretts, Twin Lakes, Pinetta, Valdosta Regional Airport, Kinderlou, I-75 At Exit 5, Nankin, I-75 At Exit 29, Empress, Clyattville, and Brooks Co A/p. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
